name: Dragon Hatchling Doll Hide
description: Double-click to combine Dragon Hatchling Doll Adornments, Eyes, Hide, Frame, and Stuffing to create a Dragon Hatchling Doll.

name: Handful of Fractal Relics
description: Contains 3 Fractal Relics. Right-click to consume them all.

details.name: Nourishment
details.description:
60% to Gain Swiftness on Kill
+5% Damage While Moving
+10% Experience from Kills
+30% Magic Find

name: Bitterfrost Vantage Point
description:
Located high in the mountains of the Bitterfrost Frontier, the vantage point offers an amazing view of the land.
Vantage points do not host any services.
Requires "A Crack in the Ice."

name: Dragon Hatchling Doll Adornments
description: Double-click to combine Dragon Hatchling Doll Adornments, Eyes, Hide, Frame, and Stuffing to create a Dragon Hatchling Doll.

name: Caustic Nightmare Nettleguard Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Fractal Expert's Research Chest
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains a Pristine Fractal Relic, 2 +1 Agony Infusions, a Large Mist Offensive Potion, 3 Fractal Encryptions, and a Fractal Research Page.
Bonus rewards with the Agony Channeler or Recursive Resourcing Mastery.

name: Koda's Reach
description: Unlocks this skill for use while wielding Koda's Flame.

name: Svanir Disguise: Legs
description: Must have Svanir chest, legs, and helm to make a disguise.

name: Smoked Fish Dinner
description:
This fish has been preserved through smoking and was given to you by the Priory arcanist.

<c=@flavor>"Aurene has been eyeing this—and drooling—ever since I put it in my pack."</c>

name: Dragon Hatchling Doll
description: Take this to Aurene to complete the Gift of Aurene collection.

name: Watchknight Statue
description: A souvenir from the lands of the humans. Bring this to Aurene to show her an example of human ingenuity.

name: Caustic Nightmare Thornblade Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Black Ice Band (Infused)
description: <c=@flavor>An icy chill emanates from the ring.</c>

name: Dragon Hatchling Doll Frame
description: Double-click to combine Dragon Hatchling Doll Adornments, Eyes, Hide, Frame, and Stuffing to create a Dragon Hatchling Doll.

name: Recipe: Gossamer Stuffing
description: Double-click to learn a recipe

name: Mini Chicken
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Wolf-Tooth Trophy
description: <c=@flavor>The tooth is large and dangerous.</c>

name: Bundle of Children's Toys
description:
Various toys of all sizes and descriptions. These would make a fine gift for any child looking to amuse themselves.

<c=@flavor>"It's a miracle I was able to retrieve these without getting them wet!"</c>

name: Clump of Frostbitten Suet
description: Used to brew a thaw elixir. Packets of frostbitten suet are carried by creatures in Bitterfrost Frontier.

name: Friendship
description: <c=@flavor>This weapon is used to craft the legendary shield Shooshadoo.</c>

name: Gift of Shooshadoo
description: Used to craft the legendary shield Shooshadoo.

name: Nightmare Thornblade Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Recipe: Trust
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Trust.

name: Koda's Breath
description: Unlocks this skill for use while wielding Koda's Flame.

name: Karmic Retribution
description: Permanently gain bonus karma while killing foes in Bitterfrost Frontier. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Wolf-Tooth Trophy
description: <c=@flavor>The tooth is large and dangerous.</c>

name: Tribute to Friendship
description: Use weaponsmithing to refine Tribute to Friendship into Shards of Friendship, which are used to craft the legendary shield precursor, Friendship.

name: Story Unlock: "A Crack in the Ice"
Offering Basket
description: Double-click to combine 25 Elder Wood Logs, 50 Globs of Ectoplasm, 10 Icy Runestones, and 5 Winterberries to create an offering for Koda.

name: Endless Kodan Tonic
description: Combat Tonic: Double-click to transform into a kodan or return to normal.

name: Block of the Solid Ocean
description: Purchase to deposit this decoration into guild storage.

name: Eir's Legacy Longbow
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow. This skin will be unlocked in your wardrobe for future use.
<c=@flavor>A replica crafted to honor Eir's legend. It smells of elm and wolf fur.</c>

name: Winterberry Strongbox
description: Double-click to open.

name: Small Charr Car
description: A souvenir from the lands of the charr. Bring this to Aurene to show her an example of charr engineering.

name: Chicken Feather
description: Used to make grawl shrines in Bitterfrost Frontier.

name: Coral Loop
description: This coral ring looks very uncomfortable.

name: Chest of the Bitterfrost Frontier Hero
description: Double-click to open. Contains 1 Sip of Liquid Karma, 2 Winterberries, 25 Unbound Magic, and 1 Scrap of Maguuma Mastery (Autoconsume).

name: Male Norn Holo-Dancer
description: Purchase to deposit this decoration into guild storage.

name: String of Grawl Prayer Beads
description: Each bead appears to be a chunk of crudely carved rock.

name: Shiny Bit of Ice
description: Used to make grawl shrines in Bitterfrost Frontier.

name: Tasty Herb
description: Hardy herbs grow here.

name: Mini Ice Beast
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Svanir Disguise: Helm
description: Must have Svanir chest, legs, and helm to make a disguise.

name: Recipe: Dragon Hatchling Doll Adornments
description: Double-click to learn a recipe

name: Model Zephyr Sanctum
description: A souvenir of the Zephyrites. Bring this to Aurene to show her how Tyria cared for her before she was born.

name: Nightmare Nettleguard Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Recipe: Winterberry Pie
description: Double-click to learn a recipe

name: Fresh Winterberry
description: Used to brew a thaw elixir, traded with Slooshoo, or consumed for unbound magic.

name: Jar of Savory Winterberry Sauce
description: Ingredient

name: Winterberry Bush Node

name: Mini Icebrood Ogre
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Bitterfrost Frontier Portal Scroll
description: Double-click to teleport to the Sorrow's Eclipse Sanctuary in Bitterfrost Frontier. <c=@Warning>This item cannot be used while in combat.</c>

name: Chunk of the Solid Ocean
description: Purchase to deposit this decoration into guild storage.

name: Raw Fish
description: Bits of fresh fish ready to be preserved by smoking.

name: Bitterfrost Frontier Cache
description: Double-click to gain Dragonite Ore, Empyreal Fragments, Obsidian Shards, Mystic Clovers, Unbound Magic, Testimonies of Heroics, and the choice of gloves or Winterberries.

name: Bundle of Winterberries
description: Used to brew a thaw elixir, traded with Slooshoo, or consumed for unbound magic.

name: Ice Encasement Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

description: <c=@flavor>Looks like someone sent you a lot of gifts! Double-click to open all of them in a frenzy of torn wrapping paper.</c>

description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

name: Daybreak Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Solar and Lunar Dye Kit
description:
Contains one random armor dye from a pool of 25 colors that includes six exclusive colors.

Dyes can be unlocked for unlimited use to color armor on all characters. Dye bottles can also be recycled in the Mystic Forge.

description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

description: Double-click to activate a one-time firework. Cannot be used in WvW.

description:

This shoulder skin has no stats of its own.

description:
"Used strictly for religious purposes, of course."
—Cin

This item only has value as part of a collection.
